note.p: Birth: Cropton, near Whitby, Yorkshire, England (05 October 1789)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1857-1859 vol 9 pp 57-60

Notes: Biography in RS Library. DNB does not specify the whereabouts of Upton church - there are Uptons in both Devon and Yorkshire; the former is probably the more likely place of burial. Clergyman and Arctic explorer, 'The Times' 21 March 2001
